sahoo.education: I have done my Bachelors and Masters in Biosciences from Sri Sathya Sai Institute of Higher Learning(SSSIHL), Bangalore.
sahoo.experience: Life and work have carved out opportunities for me to travel around the country and capture the frozen moments. Its been a decade that my journey began and its always a learning curve.
sahoo.experience.1: 1. Photograph exhibited in an Art gallery in Singapore. (Selected via Guru shots).
sahoo.experience.2: 2. Photographs curated and are on sale on Getty images.
sahoo.experience.3: 3. Was part of prestigious Canon and Fujifilmâ€™s Photo walk team.
sahoo.experience.4: 4. Has attended many photo walks in various cities time to time.
sahoo.experience.5: 5. Has been recognized in various popular photography contests.
sahoo.bio.1: I from a very young age was always fascinated with photos, those printed memories that could freeze time. Whenever my father used to take out his old Kodak camera, I loved getting photographed and also was excited to see how he clicks it.
sahoo.bio.2: Years passed and in 2009 I got my hands on my 1 st Digital camera. Thus, began my journey into this fascinating and enchanting world of Photography.
sahoo.bio.3: Photography gives my soul happiness; it connects me to myself. Getting a good photograph makes me smile. The concept of photography is unique, it freezes the uncontrollable time, and that frozen moment creates beautiful and interesting memories. Photography for me is to express myself in my own way, to let me grab hold of creativity and ride along its journey as destiny desires.
sahoo.bio.4: I was always attracted and attached to stories, be it about an individual or a place or a saga. Thus, my style of photography has always been to tell a tale through my lenses, to act out my perspective of world with the power of Lens and Light of my creativity.
